name: StatusPage Notification
description: This plugin receive the webhooks from StatusPage and post as a message in a channel.

settings_schema.footer:
Use this webhook URL to set up the StatusPage integration.

`https://SITEURL/plugins/statuspage/webhook?service=<NAME_OF_THE_SERVICE>&token=<TOKEN>`

settings.help_text: Select the team that this integration is attached to.
Name of the Channel you want to create/use to post the messages.
Select the username that this integration is attached to.
The token to use when setting the webhook. The request need send the token to validate the request.
